metadata.Title: CVE-2019-11815 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in rds_tcp_kill_sock in net/rds/tcp.c in the Linuxkernel before 5.0.8. There is a race condition leading to a use-after-free,related to net namespace cleanup.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-11815` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-150.176
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-150.176
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-lowlatency - 4.4.0-150.176
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1110-raspi2 - 4.4.0-1110.118
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1114-snapdragon - 4.4.0-1114.119
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1129-aws - 4.4.0-1084.94
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-143-generic - 4.15.0-55.60~16.04.2
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-143-generic - 4.15.0-55.60~16.04.2
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-143-lowlatency - 4.15.0-55.60~16.04.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1114-azure - 4.15.0-1051.56
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1099-gcp - 4.15.0-1037.39~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1094-kvm - 4.4.0-1047.53
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-1102-aws - 4.15.0-1047.49~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1071-oracle - 4.15.0-1018.20~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-150.176').
